text: [Music]
hello everyone my name is Lu with AWS
and today I'll be providing you an
overview of patch manager a component of
the systems managers service patch
manager is an automated tool that helps
you simplify your operating system
patching process including selecting the
patches you want to deploy the timing
for patch rollouts controlling instance
reboots and many other tasks you can
define Auto approval rules for patches
with an added ability to blacklist or
whitelist specific patches control how
the patches are deployed on the target
instances and schedule the automatic
roll out through maintenance windows
these capabilities help you automate
your patch maintenance process to save
you time and reduce the risk of
non-compliance thank you for watching
this overview of patch manager a Systems
Manager component stay tuned for future
demos on how to use the service
[Music]
